articles.author: Michael Le Page
articles.title: Coronavirus: How do I get tested and how does the test work?
articles.description: Think you might be infected with coronavirus? Here's what to do and how the test works
articles.content:
By Michael Le Page
Hospitals have set up testing areas for covid-19
Michael Cooper/PA Wire/PA Images 
Think you might be infected with coronavirus? Here’s what to do and how the test works.
